query:
UPDATE formandos 
SET cabeloSimples = 1, 
    cabeloCombinado = 0, 
    makeFormando = 1, 
    makeFamilia = 2
WHERE turmaId = (SELECT id FROM turmas WHERE codigo = '654')
LIMIT 3;
